data.text: @chrischirp @ScienceMagazine @IndependentSage @Daltmann10 My god why are we still talking about this
@chrischirp @ScienceMagazine @IndependentSage @Daltmann10 Are there any other under 5s vaccines in the pipeline other than Pfizer?

@chrischirp @ScienceMagazine @IndependentSage @Daltmann10 All data possible needs to be extracted from any future and current vaccine trials towards this outcome. Specifically, ask questions about role. How able is the person able to do routine activities. 'fatigue' can mean 'I can't run 3 miles after work' or 'bedbound'.

@chrischirp @ScienceMagazine @IndependentSage @Daltmann10 I would note that vaccine trials and concepts need to bear in mind that at the moment, for many age groups, years lost to #longcovid exceed years lost to death, and vaccine protection against this outcome is terrible (40%) compared to the protection from prompt severe outcome.
@chrischirp @ScienceMagazine @IndependentSage @Daltmann10 Hi what is ‘immune imprinting’- I like the last option otherwise. Thanks for sharing
